name: Puzzle Clock
description:
CONTROLS

===============================

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

U or Undo button to undo

===============================

HOW TO PLAY

===============================

Every time you move you use one second.

Every ten seconds, you change colors.

When you move, you change the tile you were on to whatever color you are.

You cannot be on a tile that is the same color as you.

You cannot move on a tile if you will change to that color next move.

Make your way to the goal and have fun!
